metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28724 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Open redirect vulnerability in werkzeug before 0.11.6 via a double slash in the URL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28724` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-werkzeug - 0.14.1+dfsg1-1
python3-werkzeug - 0.14.1+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-werkzeug package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.14.1+dfsg1-1').
